questions.question: What is the CMake project name?
What is the project version?
What is the minimum CMake version required?
Is enable_testing() called in this project? (Answer yes or no)
How many .jar files are built by this project?
How many .exe files are built? (assume Windows artifacts)
How many .dll files are built? (assume Windows artifacts)
How many tests are defined in total?
What are the names of the 4 main sub-aggregator targets (defined with add_custom_target and depend on multiple components)? (Provide a list)
What subdirectories are commented out in the root CMakeLists.txt? (Provide a list)
What source files are used to build cdts_test.exe? (Provide a list, include primary test file)

actual: Shared SDK sources gathered as sdk_src from metaffi-core/plugin-sdk and its compiler/runtime/utils folders

questions.question: What source files are used to build python_runtime_test.exe? (Provide a list, include primary test file)

actual: sdk_src from lang-plugin-python311/plugin-sdk (compiler/, runtime/, utils/ support code)

questions.question: What external packages does xllr.dll depend on? (Provide a list)
What external packages does metaffi.exe depend on? (Provide a list)
What external JAR packages does openjdk_idl_extractor.jar depend on? (Provide a list)
How many components depend on JNI?
How many components depend on doctest?
What test framework is used for python3_api_unitest?
What programming language is metaffi.compiler.python311.dll written in?
Which components in the openjdk aggregator are written in Java? (Provide a list, use component names without extensions)

What is the complete dependency chain from metaffi.api.jar to its deepest runtime dependency? (Provide the chain using arrow notation like 'A → B → C' with Windows artifact names, or describe it as 'A depends on B which depends on C')
expected: metaffi.api depends on xllr.openjdk.bridge which depends on xllr.openjdk.jni.bridge which depends on xllr.openjdk

claude_NORIG.actual: metaffi.api.jar depends on xllr.openjdk.bridge.jar which depends on xllr.openjdk.jni.bridge.dll which depends on xllr.openjdk.dll

questions.question: How many components can be built in parallel because they have zero inter-component dependencies?
If xllr.openjdk.dll fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)
Can xllr.python311.dll and xllr.openjdk.dll be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)
Which components does the python311 aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)
Which components does the openjdk aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)
What components does the MetaFFI top-level aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list - note that aggregators are also components)
What are the three main plugin components for the python311 plugin? (Provide a list with Windows artifact names for runtime, IDL, and compiler)
Which language plugins have all three plugin types (runtime, idl, compiler)? (Provide a list)
What is the maximum dependency depth in the project? (i.e., the longest chain from any component to its deepest dependency)

correlation.pattern: Agents with higher baseline show less improvement from RIG

time_reduction_vs_score_improvement.correlation_note: Greater time reduction correlates with better score improvement
